mapper.select: SELECT P.PET_SITTER_NO,P.PET_SITTER_NAME, P.INTRODUCE ,P.DOG_KEYWORD,P.TYPE_KEYWORD ,P.ORIGIN_NAME,P.FILE_PATH FROM PET_SITTER P WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM RESERVATION R WHERE R.PET_SITTER_NO = P.PET_SITTER_NO AND R.VISIT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{visitDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND ( (R.START_TIME < #{startTime} AND R.END_TIME > #{endTime}) ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_ID,PET_OWNER_NAME ,ADDRESS, PHONE,VISIT_DATE ,START_TIME,END_TIME, RESERVATION_DATE ,CAUTION, PET_NAME ,STATUS ,PET_SITTER_NO ,DURATION, PET_TYPE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME ,PAYMENT_STATUS,USER_ID ,TOTAL_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{petOwnerName}, #{address}, #{phone}, TO_DATE(#{visitDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{startTime}, #{endTime}, SYSDATE, #{caution}, #{petName}, DEFAULT, #{petSitterNo}, #{duration}, #{petTypeNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, DEFAULT, #{userId}, #{totalAmount} )
mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_ID ,PG_NAME ,USER_NAME ,USER_ID ,AMOUNT ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PAYMENT_METHOD ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PAYMENT_DATE ,PAYMENT_STATUS ,DIFFERENT_NO ,RESERVATION_ID ,RESERVATION_HOUSE_NO FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENT_ID = #{paymentId}
SELECT H.OWNER_NAME, H.HOUSE_ADDRESS, H.INTRODUCTION_SUMMARY, H.ORIGIN_NAME, H.FILE_PATH, H.HOUSE_NO FROM HOUSE H

SELECT H.OWNER_NAME, H.HOUSE_ADDRESS, H.INTRODUCTION_SUMMARY, H.ORIGIN_NAME, H.FILE_PATH, H.HOUSE_NO FROM HOUSE H WHERE H.HOUSE_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM HOUSE_RESERVATION R WHERE H.HOUSE_NO = R.HOUSE_NO AND R.START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.END_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HOUSE H WHERE H.HOUSE_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' AND NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM HOUSE_RESERVATION R WHERE H.HOUSE_NO = R.HOUSE_NO AND R.START_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND R.END_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
SELECT HOUSE_NO, OWNER_NAME, HOUSE_ADDRESS, INTRODUCTION_SUMMARY, INTRODUCTION_DETAILED, NEARBY_HOSPITAL, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM HOUSE WHERE HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT STAY_NO AS stayNo,STAY_NAME AS stayName,PRICE AS price FROM HOUSE_PRICE

SELECT C.CERTIFICATION_NO AS certificationNo, C.CERTIFICATION_NAME AS certificationName, C.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, C.FILE_PATH AS filePath FROM HOUSE H JOIN HOUSE_CERTIFICATION HC ON H.HOUSE_NO = HC.HOUSE_NO JOIN CERTIFICATION C ON HC.CERTIFICATION_NO = C.CERTIFICATION_NO WHERE H.HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo}

SELECT E.ENVIRONMENT_NO AS environmentNo, E.ENVIRONMENT_NAME AS environmentName FROM HOUSE H JOIN HOUSE_ENVIRONMENT HE ON H.HOUSE_NO = HE.HOUSE_NO JOIN ENVIRONMENT E ON HE.ENVIRONMENT_NO = E.ENVIRONMENT_NO WHERE H.HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo}

SELECT S.SUPPLY_GUIDE_NO AS supplyGuideNo, S.SUPPLY_GUIDE_NAME AS supplyGuideName, S.ORIGIN_NAME AS originName, S.FILE_PATH AS filePath FROM HOUSE H JOIN HOUSE_SUPPLY_GUIDE HS ON H.HOUSE_NO = HS.HOUSE_NO JOIN SUPPLY_GUIDE S ON HS.SUPPLY_GUIDE_NO = S.SUPPLY_GUIDE_NO WHERE H.HOUSE_NO = #{houseNo}
